column4: I want Ubuntu not to check my filesystems on startup ... how do I do that?
rm -rf /  (i'm joking DON"T do it)  cookie, are you shutting down cleaning? or does it say force checked or something?
not check forced, just on startup when it does whatever it does, fsck I presume.
ok, done. : ) Can someone tell me why I'm not able to do any GL stuff with ati or fglrx?
